projectName.title: What's the name of your project?
projectName.description: This could be the name of our company, or any initiative or project you are leading.

symbol.title: Name your contributive token.
symbol.description1: Your tokens will be a new equity for rewarding people who contribute to your project.
symbol.description2: Usually 3 to 5 letters. It's common to use abbreviation of your company or project.

issuance.title: Mint your tokens.
issuance.description1: Set the quantity of {{ symbol }} that you intend to give to your contributors.
issuance.description2: Start with a small number, you can issue more tokens laters if needed
issuance.help: How many tokens should I create?

custody.title: Who will keep your funds?
custody.description:
The fund will hold the part of revenues or profits that you want to distribute to your contributors.
Choose here who will control your fund.
